attributes.action: Key workers to have a pay increase/wage bonus during this difficult time.
attributes.additional_details: Key worker's are on the front-line and are most at risk at catching the virus and also passing it on. We're working harder than ever before and a pay increase would give us that extra boost we deserve. Even for example having an extra bonus percentage to our wages slip.
attributes.background: Key workers are at a high risk of catching the virus and high risk of taking it back home and infecting others. Key workers such as nhs, retail,delivery drivers,warehouse workers etc should have a pay increase during this difficult time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
